info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:27PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Dona Ana County through 600 PM MDT... At 527 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Santa Teresa, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal, Mount Riley and Kilbourne Hole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
